lead_paragraph: The three were among the tide of migrants who arrived in Germany and may have had links to last year’s Paris attackers, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Germany Says 3 From Syria Have ISIS Ties
headline.main: Germany Arrests 3 Syrians on Suspicion of ISIS Ties

snippet: The three were among the tide of migrants who arrived in Germany and may have had links to last year’s Paris attackers, the authorities said....
abstract: German authorities arrest three Syrian migrants suspected of belonging to Islamic State; men may have ties to perpetrators of Paris terrorist attacks.
